title: Happy Birthday, Hanayo!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Shēngrì kuàilè! Happy birthday, Hanayo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wow! Thanks, Lanzhu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I have to go all out to celebrate my beloved friend’s birthday! I prepared a grand feast for you today. Dig in!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Whoa~~! This looks delicious! And there’s so much food!! This is ramen, and this red thing is an egg?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>This ramen is actually longevity noodles. It’s one long noodle to wish you a long life. The round, red eggs are to wish you a smooth, harmonious year.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I see! This looks fun to eat~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>This Chinese birthday feast is just for you! I know you love rice, Hanayo, so I cooked some white rice too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m so happy you thought of all this for me! Thank you, Lanzhu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course! After all, you’re my dear friend! Come on! There’s so much food, so eat up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Alright! Don’t mind if I do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
